#table(
  columns: (1fr, auto, auto, auto),
  rows: 36pt,
  fill: (col, row) => if row == 0 { luma(240) } else { white },
  inset: 5pt,
  align: right,
  stroke: none,

  // Header
  [*Task Description*], [*Hours*], [*Rate (CAD)*], [*Amount (CAD)*],

  // Example rows - replace with your actual work
  [*[Description of work performed]*], [[Hours]], [\$[Rate].00], [\$[Amount].00],
  [*[Additional work if needed]*], [[Hours]], [\$[Rate].00], [\$[Amount].00],

  // Total row
  [], [[Total Hours]], [*TOTAL*], [*\$[Total Amount].00*]
)
